scripts.dev:all: npm run start & npm run dev
scripts.lint:api-version: bash -c "rg --pcre2 \"app\.use\(\\"/api(?!/v1)\\"\" api.js routes && echo \"Non-v1 /api routes found\" && exit 1 || exit 0"
scripts.lint:spa-console: bash -c "rg \"console\\.\" spa --glob \"!spa/utils/DebugUtils.js\" --glob \"!spa/config.js\" && echo \"Console usage found in SPA\" && exit 1 || exit 0"
scripts.lint:spa-innerhtml: bash -c "rg \"innerHTML\\s*=\" spa --glob \"!spa/utils/DOMUtils.js\" --glob \"!spa/utils/SecurityUtils.js\" && echo \"innerHTML assignment found in SPA\" && exit 1 || exit 0"
scripts.lint:sql-params: bash -c "rg --pcre2 \"pool\\.query\\(\\s*`(?![^`]*\\$\\d)\" routes utils services middleware && echo \"Non-parameterized SQL candidate found\" && exit 1 || exit 0"
